body:
Jackass below me, it doesn't matter if they are japanese, if i'm unable to read it then it's less enjoyable for me so it's something I don't like aka a problem.
And I never said the censorship was bad, did you just say that to just give me info or did you just want to sound smarter by saying 1 and 2?

@HentaiLover247
1.Its censored like that cause they just took it from twitter
2.Their a Japanese artist y would it be in english
7/10

Wayy too short, not translated, and it's in pink for some reason. Pink is my favorite colour but that doesn't mean it fits with everything. I like the character design, a pretty, all natural, bossy, futa, business woman that isn't obsessed with fucking dudes in the ass. I like the masturbating on the toilet thing too, it's always sexy asf when a futa masturbates on the toilet. As for censorship I like mosaic it's less distracting than the black or white lines or just full on god genitals, you can still make out some of the details. It's not the best mosaic censorship job but i've seen worse. For what this is it's not bad. 5/10 feels about right.
